name: FreshProduceAvailabilityInSouthernCalifornia
0:
”Alexa, ask Fresh Produce when I can get kumquats”
”Alexa, ask Fresh Produce when bell peppers are available”
”Alexa, ask Fresh Produce when avocados are in season”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fresh produce
des:
A handy informational skill for Southern California residents to ask Alexa when their favorite fruits and veggies are in season at the farmer's market. Support your local farmers!

If I missed your favorite fruit or veggie, let me know! Send any feedback, questions or corrections to: AlexaFreshProduce@gmail.com

(Data was sourced from the California Dept of Agriculture and various farmer's market association websites and is approximate of course as all sorts of factors like weather can affect availability each year.)

Icon by Mohamad Sabbagh from The Noun Project
